verbose_text: XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR In inflammatory states, with or without infection, human neutrophil peptides (HNPs) released from degranulated neutrophils can block von Willebrand factor (VWF) cleavage by ADAMTS13 in a concentration dependent manner.
evidence: peptides (HNPs) released from degranulated neutrophils can block von Willebrand factor
